app.name: HaloInfiniteGetter
app.description: A simple way to get live Halo data straight from Halo Waypoint.
errors.missing_package.description:
This action requires the "{0}" package, which is not currently installed.
You can install it using the "%s -m pip install {0}" command.
errors.missing_package.title: Missing Package
gui.license_viewer.not_found: LICENSE TEXT NOT FOUND -- COULD BE DUE TO EDITABLE INSTALLATION
gui.license_viewer.title: License Viewer
gui.outputs.image.label: Image Output: %ix%i (%.4f KiB)
gui.outputs.text.label: Text Output: %i lines; %i characters (%.4f KiB)
gui.readme_viewer.title: README Viewer
gui.settings.title: Settings
information.about.description:
{app.description}

Version Info: major:%i, minor:%i, micro:%i, releaselevel:%s, serial:%i

Running On:
	%s
	%s %s

%s

{app.copyright}
information.about.title: About
information.first_launch.description:
Welcome! Make sure to read the README to understand how to use this application. You can re-read it at anytime by navigating to "Help" in the toolbar and pressing "README".

If you prefer Dark Mode, you can change the current theme to "Breeze Dark" in Settings.
information.first_launch.title: First Launch Dialog
warnings.delete_cache.description: Are you sure you want to delete the contents of the cache? This action cannot be undone.
warnings.delete_cache.title: Confirm Cache Deletion
warnings.empty_token.description:
The spartan authorization token is not set, please set SPARTAN_AUTH environment variable and restart, or set the auth key value in Settings.

You will be unable to acquire new data until a new token is provided.
warnings.empty_token.title: Empty API Token
warnings.settings.import_failure.descrip: Could not import settings from "%s". Make sure both the file and the parent folder exist, and that the file contains valid TOML.
warnings.settings.import_failure.title: Import Error
